publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2856 Mr Stewart Maxwell: World No Tobacco Day—That the Parliament notes that 31 May 2005 is World No Tobacco Day; congratulates Scottish health professionals on their efforts to help the estimated 70% of smokers who wish to quit, and believes that the introduction of a ban on smoking in enclosed premises in Scotland will support the efforts of health professionals to make Scotland a smoke-free country.

S2M-2856 World No Tobacco Day (lodged on 23 May 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Brian Adam*, Jim Mather*, Eleanor Scott*, Jackie Baillie*, Robert Brown*, Alex Neil*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Shiona Baird*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-2856 World No Tobacco Day (lodged on 23 May 2005) Chris Ballance*, Michael Matheson*, Trish Godman*, Rosie Kane*

S2M-2856 Mr Stewart Maxwell:World No Tobacco Day—That the Parliament notes that 31 May 2005 is World No Tobacco Day; congratulates Scottish health professionals on their efforts to help the estimated 70% of smokers who wish to quit, and believes that the introduction of a ban on smoking in enclosed premises in Scotland will support the efforts of health professionals to make Scotland a smoke-free country. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Jim Mather, Eleanor Scott, Jackie Baillie, Robert Brown, Alex Neil, Mike Pringle, Rob Gibson, Carolyn Leckie, Shiona Baird, Mark Ballard, Chris Ballance, Michael Matheson, Trish Godman, Rosie Kane
S2M-2856 World No Tobacco Day (lodged on 23 May 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-2856 World No Tobacco Day (lodged on 23 May 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2856 World No Tobacco Day (lodged on 23 May 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
